DOC.brief_title: GAPP 1 Survey : Global Attitudes Patients Physicians Insulin Therapy Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: PATIENTS WITH DIABETES : Age 18 year older Treated insulin Type 1 Type 2 diabetes PHYSICIANS : In practice 1 year since complete residency See minimum number patient diabetes per week ( primary care physicians 5 , specialist 10 ) Initiate insulin treatment patient diabetes
